text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I see... So you felt the need to practice<n>alone.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I know you're a hard worker, so I'm<n>sure you really do
just want to be<n>useful to the others.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
But... don't you think you're pushing<n>yourself a little too
hard?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ayabe...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, I really appreciate it, you<n>worrying about me. But I... I'll
never<n>be enough if I don't change<n>something.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I've received so much from so many<n>people this year.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Fukukitaru is always there to lend me<n>an ear, or tell my
fortune, or find<n>knickknacks to improve my luck.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Urara has nothing but smiles for me,<n>and kind words I don't
deserve, like<n>how I'm so grown-up and<n>hardworking...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
And Opera O, she's always shining...<n>like a light for me to
look to. It's<n>because of her I can keep my chin up.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: And you, Ayabe...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Me?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
You always give me so much<n>courage. Like... do you
remember that<n>one time?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ooohhh... There I go again... Slipping<n>on the downhill,
bumping into the rail...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I... I'm such a mess... a bumbling<n>mess... At this rate, I don't
think I'm<n>ever going to be like Opera O...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Do I just have to... give up? No, not<n>yet, I should practice at
least a little<n>more...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (Wait... someone else is still here?)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Urgh.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (Ayabe's practicing too... She looks a<n>bit tired, though...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Um, A-Ayabe?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Doto? ...What, is something the<n>matter?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Hm? O-oh, no, nothing's the matter<n>here... But, are you all
right? Are you<n>sure you're not doing too much?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
This isn't "too much." I'm reaching<n>for the stars, and I can't
afford to stop<n>until I get there.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: The... stars?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Do you think you'll ever reach them?<n>I mean, they're so, so
far away...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to reach them—that's why<n>I'm here this late.
Aren't you the<n>same?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
When you said that, it made me want<n>to keep running, and
one day reach<n>the stars myself... It was the push I<n>
needed.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So you, and the others... I owe all of<n>you. You're always so
nice, and<n>accepting...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
And me, I'm always clumsy, and<n>useless, and have so
much to fix, and<n>I'm down in the dumps half the time...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: But being with you guys makes me<n>so, so happy.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: S-so that's why, next year, I want totake all of that happiness, and give itback... I have to give it back!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Doto...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I guess this is why I can never let you<n>out of my sight...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So, um... Anyway, I'm going to<n>practice a little more. Seeing
you so<n>concerned for me gave me a boost of<n>energy...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Well, um... Th-thanks so much!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: (She's going down the same path<n>again...)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Well, not that I can stop her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: That night...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Yawn. I'm so tired... And I don'teven feel like I improved much... Wait,what's this?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Did I leave something on my desk?<n>Books?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: W-whoa! They're about karuta... and<n>there's so many!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Tips for memorizing the poems,<n>training exercises for
finders and<n>takers... W-wow!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Wait, but... who would've... Oh,<n>there's a note in between
the pages...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Work hard and smart.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (Was this Ayabe? She found all these<n>for me?)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much, Ayabe! I'll studyhard and get butter at karuta! I meanbetter!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: A-all right, tonight's going to be an<n>all-night study session!
